pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, August 27, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Ottawa Pride Parade.

Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for accredited media
  • Accredited media should arrive at the corner of Bank and Gladstone no later than 1:00 p.m.
